posts.post_title: T200, T227, T202 Johnson high grade
posts.post_content:

T227 Bender (tougher Miners Extra back) SGC 20 clean and beautiful $600 OBO
T227 Bender (tougher Miners Extra back) PSA 2 $700 OBO
T200 Fatima Cubs PSA 2 Bold and sharp image! $200 OBO
T202 #9 Walter Johnson SGC 80 (MINT corners) $950 OBO (consigned under eBay store Bmw_cards2)

Thanks
Jason
